name: Ghost Mage Kiki
description:
Save the corrupted spirits which make you more powerful. you lose when you are alone.

move with wasd and mouse, use abilities with right and left click, and qer. jump with spacebar. trade types of spirits at the ghastly kiki at the start of the game.
